name: Task 2: Find Data in Contact Card Database

messages.content:
#SYSTEM: You are a helpful assistant.

#INSTRUCTIONS: You're task is to find the people or information being asked based on the DATABASE and message input. You can find the database from the below.

#RULES:
- If the message query is about interactions or the interaction database, just send First Name: {first name} and Last Name: {last name} as a result.

For more context the main headers are:
-First name: first name of the contact
-Last name: last name of the contact
-Date of Last Update: date last updated the contact info
-Company: company of the contact
-Job Description: all the relevant information about Job of the contact, for example Roles, job title, industry, job position, etc.
-Introduction: all details about introduction. main key word -here is "intro", "introduced", "introduction". for example if the contact introduced me to someone or information about other person who introduced me to this contact.
-Business Relationships: this is the business relationships of the contact. for example work relationships specifically, reports to, works with, supervisor of, all work related.
-Personal Relationships: this is the personal relationships of the contact. for example spouse, kids, relatives, uncles, aunts, friends, friends with, non-business relationships.
-Contact Category: the category of the contact. choose only from contact personal, serrala, sts.
-Appearance: some information about the appearance of the contact.
-Other Comments: other information about the contact EXCEPT last interactions. do not include last interactions here because it will be on a separate database.
-Source: the platform source of the contact. choose only from 'outlook' or 'manually'.

If there are multiple person that is qualified in the query, make sure to include all of them and put number  beside their name.

===============

#DATABASE:
{{14.text}}

END OF DATABASE

===============

input_spec.help: this is the first name of the person.
input_spec.name: firstName

input_spec.help: this is the last name of the person.
input_spec.name: lastName

input_spec.help: this is the date on last updated formatted the same as November 24 2025.
input_spec.name: dateLastUpdated

input_spec.help: this is the company of the person.
input_spec.name: company

input_spec.help: all the relevant information about Job of the contact, for example Roles, job title, industry
input_spec.name: jobDescription

input_spec.help: this is the business relationships of the contact. for example work relationships specifically, reports to, works with, supervisor of, all work related.
input_spec.name: businessRelationships

input_spec.help: this is the appearance or physical description of the person
input_spec.name: appearance

input_spec.help: other information about the contact EXCEPT last interactions. do not include last interactions here because it will be on a separate database.
input_spec.name: otherComments

input_spec.help: this is the original query message from the user.
input_spec.name: originalQuery

input_spec.help: this is the personal relationships of the contact. for example spouse, kids, relatives, uncles, aunts, friends, friends with, non-business relationships.
input_spec.name: personalRelationships

input_spec.help: the category of the contact. choose only from sales lead, colleague, client, family/friend, business.
input_spec.name: contactCategory

input_spec.help: the platform source of the contact. choose only from 'outlook' or 'manually'.
input_spec.name: source

input_spec.help: unique identifier number of the contact
input_spec.name: seqNumber

input_spec.help: all details about introduction. main key word -here is "intro", "introduced", "introduction". for example if the contact introduced me to someone or information about other person who introduced me to this contact.
input_spec.name: introduction

output_spec.help: these are the information being asked
output_spec.name: information
